Descriptions.Text:
Go berserk for {1} sec, reducing the cooldown of Frenzied Regeneration by {2}% and cost of Ironfur by {3}%.

{FFFFFFFF|Combines with other Berserk abilities.}

Go berserk for {1} sec, reducing the cooldowns of Mangle, Thrash, and Growl by {2}%.

{FFFFFFFF|Combines with other Berserk abilities.}

Go berserk for {1} sec, increasing haste by {2}%, and reducing the rage cost of Maul by {3}%.

{FFFFFFFF|Combines with other Berserk abilities.}

An improved Bear Form that grants the benefits of Berserk, causes Mangle to hit up to {1} targets, and increases maximum health by {2}%.

Lasts {3} sec. You may freely shapeshift in and out of this improved Bear Form for its duration.
For each Rejuvenation you have active, Regrowth's cost is reduced by {1}% and critical effect chance is increased by {2}%.

Command a swarm that heals {1} or deals {2} Shadow damage over {3} sec to a target, and increases the effectiveness of your periodic effects on them by {4}%.

Upon expiration, finds a new target, preferring to alternate between friend and foe up to {5} times.
Casting Starfall extends the duration of active Moonfires and Sunfires by {1} sec, up to {2} sec.
Every {1} Rage you spend causes a burst of restorative energy, healing allies within {2} yds for {3}.

You focus the assault on this target, increasing their damage taken by {1}% for {2} sec.  Each unique player that attacks the target increases the damage taken by an additional {3}%, stacking up to {4} times.

Your melee attacks refresh the duration of Focused Assault.
Rip damage has a {1}% chance to make your next Ferocious Bite free and deal the maximum damage.
Your Travel Form increases your swimspeed by {1}% and allows you to breathe underwater.

Your melee attacks have a chance to activate Incarnation: Avatar of Ashamane for {1} sec, without the ability to enter stealth in combat.

Convoke the Spirits' cooldown is reduced by {2}% and its duration and number of spells cast is reduced by {3}%. Convoke the Spirits has an increased chance to use an exceptional spell or ability.

Increases maximum Astral Power by {1} and teaches Astral Communion:

|T611423:24|t{ffffffff|Astral Communion}:
Generates {2} Astral Power. {3} sec cooldown.
Increases the range of all of your abilities by {1} yards.
Your critical strikes from Starfire and Wrath cause the target to languish for an additional {1}% of your spell's damage over {2} sec.
Entering Eclipse increases your critical strike chance with Arcane or Nature spells by {1}%, decreasing by {2}% every {3} sec.

Your skin becomes as tough as bark, reducing all damage you take by {1}% and preventing damage from delaying your spellcasts. Lasts {2} sec.

Usable while stunned, frozen, incapacitated, feared, or asleep, and in all shapeshift forms.

Shapeshift into Bear Form, increasing armor by {1}% and Stamina by {2}%, granting protection from Polymorph effects, and increasing threat generation.

The act of shapeshifting frees you from movement impairing effects.
Go berserk for {1} sec, increasing your haste by {2}%, reducing the cooldown of Frenzied Regeneration by {3}%, Mangle, Thrash, and Growl by {4}%, and reducing the cost of Maul and Ironfur by {5}%.

Go Berserk for {1} sec. While Berserk:

Finishing moves have a {2}% chance per combo point spent to refund {3} combo points.

Swipe generates {4} additional combo point.

Rake and Shred deal damage as though you were stealthed.
During Berserk your combo point-generating abilities bleed the target for an additional {1}% of their damage over {2} sec.
Each combo point spent reduces the cooldown of Berserk by {1} sec.
Thrash also generates {1} Rage each time it deals damage.
When you use {1} different combo point-generating abilities within {2} sec, the damage of your next {3} Rips or Ferocious Bites is increased by {4}%.

Sharp brambles protect you, absorbing and reflecting up to {1} damage from each attack.

While Barkskin is active, the brambles also deal {2} Nature damage to all nearby enemies every {3} sec.
Bristle your fur, causing you to generate Rage based on damage taken for {1} sec.

Strikes all nearby enemies with a massive slash, inflicting {1} Physical damage. Deals {2}% increased damage against bleeding targets. Deals reduced damage beyond {3} targets.

{FFFFFFFF|Awards {4} combo point.}
Lifebloom's healing is increased by {1}% each time it heals, up to {2}%. Also increases Lifebloom's final bloom amount by {3}%.
Tiger's Fury's damage bonus is increased by {1}%.

Shapeshift into Cat Form, increasing auto-attack damage by {1}%, movement speed by {2}%, granting protection from Polymorph effects, and reducing falling damage.

The act of shapeshifting frees you from movement impairing effects.
Clearcast abilities generate {1}% of their Energy cost.

Bring the celestial bodies into alignment over the target area, blasting all enemies for {1} Astral damage and applying Stellar Flare to them.

For {2} sec, both Eclipses are maintained and you gain {3}% haste.
Celestial bodies align, maintaining both Eclipses and granting {1}% haste for {2} sec.
Bear Form reduces magic damage taken from spells by {1}% and you may now cast Moonfire while in Bear Form.
Protects a friendly target for {1} sec. Any damage taken will consume the ward and heal the target for {2} over {3} sec.
Increases the range of your Skull Bash by {1} yards.
Your damage over time effects deal their damage in {1}% less time, and your healing over time effects in {2}% less time.

Call upon the Night Fae for an eruption of energy, channeling a rapid flurry of {1} Druid spells and abilities over {2} sec.

You will cast Starsurge, Starfall, Moonfire, Wrath, Regrowth, Rejuvenation, Rake, and Thrash on appropriate nearby targets, favoring your current shapeshift form.

Call upon the Night Fae for an eruption of energy, channeling a rapid flurry of {1} Druid spells and abilities over {2} sec.

You will cast Wild Growth, Swiftmend, Moonfire, Wrath, Regrowth, Rejuvenation, Rake, and Thrash on appropriate nearby targets, favoring your current shapeshift form.

Call upon the Night Fae for an eruption of energy, channeling a rapid flurry of {1} Druid spells and abilities over {2} sec.

You will cast Ferocious Bite, Shred, Moonfire, Wrath, Regrowth, Rejuvenation, Rake, and Thrash on appropriate nearby targets, favoring your current shapeshift form.

Call upon the Night Fae for an eruption of energy, channeling a rapid flurry of {1} Druid spells and abilities over {2} sec.

You will cast Mangle, Ironfur, Moonfire, Wrath, Regrowth, Rejuvenation, Rake, and Thrash on appropriate nearby targets, favoring your current shapeshift form.
Your Moonfire, Sunfire, and Stellar Flare deal damage {1}% faster.
Using Moonfire on a target already afflicted by Moonfire's damage over time effect deals {1}% additional direct damage.
When Rejuvenation heals a target below {1}% health, it applies Cultivation to the target, healing them for {2} over {3} sec.
Tosses the enemy target into the air, disorienting them but making them invulnerable for up to {1} sec. Only one target can be affected by your Cyclone at a time.
Shift into Cat Form and increase your movement speed by {1}% while in Cat Form for {2} sec.
When Moonfire, Rake, Rip, or Rejuvenation are active on a single target, their effects are increased {1}%.
Increases the amount of damage required to cancel your Entangling Roots by {1}%.
Demoralizes all enemies within {1} yards, reducing the damage they do by {2}% for {3} sec.
You bolster nearby allies within {1} yards, increasing their maximum health by {2}%.
Your Moonfire and Sunfire have a chance to summon a Faerie Dragon to assist you in battle for {1} sec.
Efflorescence removes all snare effects from friendly targets when it heals.
Rake also applies Rake to {1} additional nearby target.
Rip damage increased by {1}%.

When you take non-periodic damage, you have a chance equal to your critical strike to cause your next Regrowth to heal for an additional {1}%, and to be instant, free, and castable in all forms for {2} sec. 

This effect cannot occur more than once every {3} sec.
While channeling Tranquility, your other Druid spell cooldowns are reduced by up to {1} seconds.
Sunfire and Moonfire generate {1} Astral Power when they are dispelled.
When you deal direct damage with Thrash, you gain a charge of Earthwarden, reducing the damage of the next auto attack you take by {1}%. Earthwarden may have up to {2} charges.
Grows a healing blossom at the target location, restoring {1} health to three injured allies within {2} yards every {3} sec for {4} sec. Limit {5}.
While in Bear Form, you deal {1}% increased Arcane damage, and are healed for {2}% of all Arcane damage done.

Incarnation: Chosen of Elune reduces the Astral Power cost of Starsurge by {1}, and the Astral Power cost of Starfall by {2}.

Convoke the Spirits' cooldown is reduced by {3}% and its duration and number of spells cast is reduced by {4}%. Convoke the Spirits has an increased chance to use an exceptional spell or ability.
Wild Growth has a {1}% chance to momentarily shift your mind into the Emerald Dream, instantly healing all allies affected by your Rejuvenation or Regrowth for {2}.

Embrace the Emerald Dream, causing you to enter a deep slumber for {1} sec. While sleeping, all other cooldowns recover {2}% faster, and allies within {3} yds are healed for {4} every {5} sec.

Direct damage taken may awaken you.
Ironbark now also grants the target Nature's Grasp, rooting the first {1} melee attackers for {2} sec.
Entangling Roots is now an instant cast spell with a {1} second cooldown but with a {2} yard range. It can also be cast while in shapeshift forms.
Roots the target in place for {1} sec. Damage may cancel the effect.
Swarms the target with Faeries, disarming the enemy, preventing the use of any weapons or shield and reducing movement speed by {1}% for {2} sec.
Soothe and Remove Corruption are usable in Cat Form.
Increases your movement speed by {1}%.

Unleash a furious frenzy, clawing your target {1} times for {2} Physical damage and an additional {3} Bleed damage over {4} sec.

{FFFFFFFF|Awards {5} combo points.}
Reduces the chance enemies have to detect you while Prowl is active.

Finishing move that causes Physical damage per combo point and consumes up to {1} additional Energy to increase damage by up to {2}%.

   {3} point  : {4} damage
   {5} points: {6} damage
   {7} points: {8} damage
   {9} points: {10} damage
   {11} points: {12} damage
Attacking with a {1} combo point Ferocious Bite reduces the target's maximum health by up to {2}% for {3} sec, stacking up to {4} times. Ferocious Wound can only be active on one target at once.
Clearcast Regrowths heal for an additional {1}%.
Thrash has a {1}% chance to trigger an additional Thrash.
Your Travel Form allows you to fly and increases your movement speed by {1}%.
Extends the duration of all of your heal over time effects on friendly targets within {1} yards by {2} sec, and increases the rate of your heal over time effects by {3}% for {4} sec.
Reduces the mana cost of your Lifebloom by {1}%, and your Lifebloom also applies Focused Growth to the target, increasing Lifebloom's healing by {2}%. Stacks up to {3} times.

Summons a stand of {1} Treants for {2} sec which immediately taunt and attack enemies in the targeted area.

{FFFFFFFF|Generates {3} Astral Power.}
Nourish extends the duration of your Lifebloom, Rejuvenation, Regrowth, and Wild Growth effects on the target by {1} sec.
Casting Regrowth increases your movement speed and healing received by {1}% for {2} sec.
Finishing moves have a {1}% chance per combo point spent to grant {2}% Haste for {3} sec.
Your Stampeding Roar clears all roots and snares from yourself and allies.
Heals you for {1}% health over {2} sec, and increases healing received by {3}%.
Rake has a {1}% increased critical strike chance if used on a target that doesnt already have Rake active.
When a Faerie Dragon is summoned, your Arcane and Nature damage is increased by {1}% for {2} sec.

Stampeding Roar's radius and duration are increased by {1}%.

Your movement speed is increased by {2}%.
Enemies struck by Wild Mushrooms are damaged for an additional {1}% over {2} sec and slowed by {3}%.

Calls down a beam of pure celestial energy that follows the enemy, dealing up to {1} Astral damage over {2} sec within its area. Damage reduced on secondary targets.

{FFFFFFFF|Generates {3} Astral Power over its duration.}
While in Bear Form, you deal {1}% increased Arcane damage.

Your damage has a {1}% chance to trigger a free automatic Moonfire on that target. 

When this occurs, the next Moonfire you cast generates {2} Rage, and deals {3}% increased direct damage.
Increases Typhoon's radius by {1}% and its range by {2} yds.
You can apply Rejuvenation twice to the same target. Rejuvenation's duration is increased by {1} sec.
Thrash, Swipe, Moonfire, and Maul have a {1}% chance to reset the cooldown on Mangle, and to cause it to generate an additional {2} Rage.
Mangle has a {1}% chance to reduce the Rage cost of your next Ironfur by {2}%.
Summon a grove to protect allies in the area for {1} sec, reducing damage taken by {2}% from enemies outside the grove.
Swiftmend heals the target for {1} over {2} sec.
Taunts the target to attack you.
Mangle increases the duration of your next Ironfur by {1} sec, or the healing of your next Frenzied Regeneration by {2}%.
Lifebloom counts for {1} stacks of Mastery: Harmony.

Abilities not associated with your specialization are substantially empowered for {1} sec.

{FFFFFFFF|Feral:} Physical damage increased by {2}%.

{FFFFFFFF|Guardian:} Bear Form gives an additional {3}% Stamina, multiple uses of Ironfur may overlap, and Frenzied Regeneration has {4} charges.

{FFFFFFFF|Restoration:} Healing increased by {5}%, and mana costs reduced by {6}%.

Abilities not associated with your specialization are substantially empowered for {1} sec.

{FFFFFFFF|Balance:} Magical damage increased by {2}%.

{FFFFFFFF|Feral:} Physical damage increased by {3}%.

{FFFFFFFF|Restoration:} Healing increased by {4}%, and mana costs reduced by {5}%.

Abilities not associated with your specialization are substantially empowered for {1} sec.

{FFFFFFFF|Balance:} Magical damage increased by {2}%.

{FFFFFFFF|Feral:} Physical damage increased by {3}%.

{FFFFFFFF|Guardian:} Bear Form gives an additional {4}% Stamina, multiple uses of Ironfur may overlap, and Frenzied Regeneration has {5} charges.

Abilities not associated with your specialization are substantially empowered for {1} sec.

{FFFFFFFF|Balance:} Magical damage increased by {2}%.

{FFFFFFFF|Guardian:} Bear Form gives an additional {3}% Stamina, multiple uses of Ironfur may overlap, and Frenzied Regeneration has {4} charges.

{FFFFFFFF|Restoration:} Healing increased by {5}%, and mana costs reduced by {6}%.
Forces the enemy target to sleep for up to {1} sec.  Any damage will awaken the target.  Only one target can be forced to hibernate at a time.  Only works on Beasts and Dragonkin.
Cyclone leaves the target reeling, reducing their damage and healing by {1}% for {2} sec.
Barkskin's duration is increased by {1} sec.
Ironbark's cooldown is reduced by {1} sec.
Nature's Cure additionally removes all Curse and Poison effects.
Regrowth's initial heal has a {1}% increased chance for a critical effect if the target is already affected by Regrowth.
Rejuvenation's duration is increased by {1} sec.
Cooldown reduced by {1} sec.
Sunfire now applies its damage over time effect to all enemies within {1} yards.
Survival Instincts now has {1} charges.
Increases Brutal Slash damage by {1}%.
Increases Swipe damage by {1}%.
Wild Growth heals {1} additional target.
Shift into Bear Form and invoke the spirit of Ursol to let loose a deafening roar, incapacitating all enemies within {1} yards for {2} sec. Damage will cancel the effect.

An improved Cat Form that grants all of your known Berserk effects and lasts {1} sec. You may shapeshift in and out of this improved Cat Form for its duration. During Incarnation:

Energy cost of all Cat Form abilities is reduced by {2}%, and Prowl can be used once while in combat.

Finishing moves have a {3}% chance per combo point spent to refund {4} combo points.

Rake and Shred deal damage as though you were stealthed.

An improved Moonkin Form that grants both Eclipses, any learned Celestial Alignment bonuses, and {1}% critical strike chance.

Lasts {2} sec. You may shapeshift in and out of this improved Moonkin Form for its duration.

An improved Bear Form that grants the benefits of Berserk, causes Mangle to hit up to {1} targets, and increases maximum health by {2}%.

Lasts {3} sec. You may freely shapeshift in and out of this improved Bear Form for its duration.

Shapeshift into the Tree of Life, increasing healing done by {1}%, increasing armor by {2}%, and granting protection from Polymorph effects. Functionality of Rejuvenation, Wild Growth, Regrowth, and Entangling Roots is enhanced.

Lasts {3} sec. You may shapeshift in and out of this form for its duration.
Reduces the cooldown of Typhoon by {1} sec.
Mangle and Maul cause an Infected Wound in the target, reducing their movement speed by {1}% for {2} sec.
Rake damage increased by {1}%, and Rake causes an Infected Wound in the target, reducing the target's movement speed by {2}% for {3} sec.

Regrowth and Frenzied Regeneration healing is increased by {1}% on yourself.

Frenzied Regeneration has {2} additional charge.

Reduces the cooldown of Tranquility by {1} sec.

While channeling Tranquility, you take {2}% reduced damage and are immune to knockbacks.
Infuse a friendly healer with energy, allowing them to cast spells without spending mana for {1} sec.
Refreshes the duration of your active Lifebloom and Rejuvenation effects on the target and causes them to complete {1}% faster.
The target's skin becomes as tough as Ironwood, reducing damage taken by {1}% for {2} sec.
Increases armor by {1} for {2} sec.
Tranquility protects you from all harm while it is channeled, and its healing is increased by {1}%.
Physical damage and Armor increased by {1}%.
For every enemy you have Rip active on, your movement speed and healing received is increased by {1}%. Stacks {2} times.
Ironfur has a {1}% chance to apply two stacks and Frenzied Regeneration has a {2}% chance to not consume a charge.

While in Cat Form, you increase the critical chance of raid members within {1} yards by {2}%.

Leader of the Pack also causes allies to heal themselves for {3}% of their maximum health when they critically hit with a direct attack. The healing effect cannot occur more than once every {4} sec.

Heals the target for {1} over {2} sec. When Lifebloom expires or is dispelled, the target is instantly healed for {3}.

May be active on one target at a time.
Reduces the remaining cooldown on Solar Beam by {1} sec when it interrupts the primary target.
You gain Dodge equal to {1}% of your Critical Strike from gear.
Ferocious Bite and Rip deal {1}% increased damage.
Summons a beam of lunar light at your location, dealing {1} Arcane damage and healing you for {2} over {3} sec.
Moonfire is usable in Cat Form, costs {1} energy, and generates {2} combo point.
Starfall's stars have a chance to deal an additional {1}% damage to nearby enemies when they damage an enemy afflicted by Moonfire. Deals reduced damage beyond {2} targets.
Rejuvenation healing has a {1}% chance to create a new Rejuvenation on a nearby target.

You gain {1}% of a stat while in each form:

No Form: Haste
Cat Form: Critical Strike
Bear Form: Versatility
Moonkin Form: Mastery

Finishing move that causes Physical damage and stuns the target. Damage and duration increased per combo point:

   {1} point  : {2} damage, {3} sec
   {4} points: {5} damage, {6} sec
   {7} points: {8} damage, {9} sec
   {10} points: {11} damage, {12} sec
   {13} points: {14} damage, {15} sec
Your Travel Form movement speed while within a Battleground or Arena is increased by {1}% and you always move at {2}% movement speed while in Travel Form.

Mangle the target for {1} Physical damage. Deals {2}% additional damage against bleeding targets.

{FFFFFFFF|Generates {3} Rage.}
Mangle deals {1}% additional damage against bleeding targets.

Mangle the target for {1} Physical damage.

{FFFFFFFF|Generates {2} Rage.}

Infuse a friendly target with the power of the wild, increasing their Versatility by {1}% for {2} minutes.

If target is in your party or raid, all party and raid members will be affected.
Roots the target and all enemies within {1} yards in place for {2} sec. Damage may interrupt the effect. Usable in all shapeshift forms.
Your Nature spells deal {1}% additional damage to targets affected by Sunfire. Your Arcane spells deal {2}% additional damage to targets affected by Moonfire.
Your healing is increased by {1}% for each of your Restoration heal over time effects on the target.

Increases your maximum health and healing received by {1}%.

Also increases your attack power by {2}%.
Increases the damage done by your Cat Form bleed abilities and finishing moves by {1}%.
When you use Barkskin or Survival Instincts, absorb {1} damage for {2} sec.
Maul the target for {1} Physical damage.
Shred deals {1}% increased damage and Brutal Slash deals {2}% increased damage against bleeding targets.
Invokes the spirit of Ursoc to stun the target for {1} sec. Usable in all shapeshift forms.
Omen of Clarity now triggers {1}% more often, can accumulate up to {2} charges, and increases the damage of your next Shred, Thrash, or Brutal Slash by {3}%.
Entering an Eclipse summons a beam of light at your location granting you {1}% reduction in silence and interrupts for {2} sec.

A quick beam of lunar light burns the enemy for {1} Arcane damage and then an additional {2} Arcane damage over {3} sec.

{FFFFFFFF|Generates {4} Astral Power.}

A quick beam of lunar light burns the enemy for {1} Arcane damage and then an additional {2} Arcane damage over {3} sec.

{FFFFFFFF|Awards {4} combo point.}
A quick beam of lunar light burns the enemy for {1} Arcane damage and then an additional {2} Arcane damage over {3} sec.
Starsurge grants {1}% spell critical strike chance to {2} allies within {3} yards for {4} sec, stacking up to {5} times.

Shapeshift into Moonkin Form, increasing the damage of your spells by {1}% and your armor by {2}%, and granting protection from Polymorph effects.

While in this form, single-target attacks against you have a {3}% chance to make your next Starfire instant.

The act of shapeshifting frees you from movement impairing effects.

Shapeshift into Moonkin Form, increasing the damage of your spells by {1}% and your armor by {2}%, and granting protection from Polymorph effects.

The act of shapeshifting frees you from movement impairing effects.
When you cast a single-target ability on an enemy afflicted by Moonfire, you cause them to burn for an additional {1}% Arcane damage.
Healing done and healing taken increased by {1}%.

While in combat you generate {1} Astral Power every {2} sec.

While out of combat your Astral Power rebalances to {3} instead of depleting to empty.
Cures harmful effects on the friendly target, removing all Magic, Curse, and Poison effects.
After an Eclipse ends, you gain {1}% Haste for {2} sec.
The healing bonus to Regrowth from Nature's Swiftness is increased by {1}%.
Your next Regrowth, Rebirth, or Entangling Roots is instant, free, castable in all forms, and heals for an additional {1}%.
For {1} sec, all single-target damage also heals a nearby friendly target for {2}% of the damage done.
For {1} sec, all single-target healing also damages a nearby enemy target for {2}% of the healing done.

Deals {1}{2} Astral damage to the target and empowers New Moon to become Half Moon. 

{FFFFFFFF|Generates {3} Astral Power.}
Heals a friendly target for {1}.  Receives {2}% bonus from {ffffffff|Mastery: Harmony}.
When your Rejuvenation heals a full health target, its duration is increased by {1} sec, up to a maximum total increase of {2} sec per cast.
Magical damage and healing increased by {1}%.

Your auto attacks have a high chance to cause a Clearcasting state, making your next Shred, Thrash, or Brutal Slash cost no Energy and deal {1}% more damage.

Clearcasting can accumulate up to {2} charges.
Your healing over time from Lifebloom has a {1}% chance to cause a Clearcasting state, making your next Regrowth cost no mana.
Every {1}th Shooting Star calls down a Full Moon at {2}% power upon its target.

Celestial Alignment blasts all enemies in a targeted area for {1} Astral damage and applies Stellar Flare to them.

Reduces the cooldown of Celestial Alignment by {2} sec.
Apply Lifebloom, Rejuvenation, Wild Growth, and Regrowth's heal over time effect to an ally.
Charge to an enemy, stunning them for {1} sec and knocking back their allies within {2} yards.
Owlkin Frenzy can stack up to {1} times and reduces the cast time of your next Cyclone or Entangling Roots by {2}%.
Nature's Swiftness's cooldown is reduced by {1} sec.

While your Lifebloom is on yourself, your periodic heals heal {1}% faster.

While your Lifebloom is on an ally, your periodic heals on them have a {2}% chance to cause it to bloom.

While stealthed, Rake will also stun the target for {1} sec, and deal {2}% increased damage.

While stealthed, Shred deals {3}% increased damage, has double the chance to critically strike, and generates {4} additional combo point.
Starsurge has a chance to summon the Spirit of Goldrinn, which immediately deals {1} Astral damage to the target.
Wild Growth has a {1}% chance to cause your next Rejuvenation or Regrowth to apply to {2} additional allies within {3} yards of the target.
If an interrupt is used on you while you are not casting, gain {1}% Haste and become immune to crowd control, interrupt, and cast pushback effects for {2} sec.
The cooldown on Tiger's Fury resets when a target dies with one of your Bleed effects active, and Tiger's Fury lasts {1} additional seconds.
Your finishing moves have a {1}% chance per combo point to make your next Regrowth or Entangling Roots instant, free, and castable in all forms.
Your combo point generating abilities have a {1}% chance to generate {2} extra combo point.

When you critically strike with an attack that generates a combo point, you gain an additional combo point.

Damage over time cannot trigger this effect.

Finishing move that deals instant damage and applies Rip to all enemies within {1} yards. Lasts longer per combo point.

   {2} point  : {3} plus Rip for {4} sec
   {5} points: {6} plus Rip for {7} sec
   {8} points: {9} plus Rip for {10} sec
   {11} points: {12} plus Rip for {13} sec
   {14} points: {15} plus Rip for {16} sec
Every {1} Astral Power spent grants Celestial Alignment for {2} sec.
Your Regrowth protects you, reducing all damage you take by {1}% while your Regrowth is on you.
When using Regrowth on an ally the initial heal will always have a critical effect and the cast time of Regrowth will be reduced by {1}% for {2} sec.
Store {1}% of your damage, up to {2}. Your next Regrowth consumes all stored damage to increase its healing.
Store {1}% of your effective healing, up to {2}. Your next Moonfire consumes all stored healing to increase its damage dealt.
Shift into Cat Form and enter stealth.
A devastating blow that consumes {1} stacks of your Thrash on the target to deal {2} Physical damage and reduce the damage they deal to you by {3}% for {4} sec.

Full Moon becomes Full Moon once more before resetting to New Moon.

Fury of Elune's cooldown is reduced by {1} sec.
Unleashes the rage of Ursoc for {1} sec, preventing {2}% of all damage you take, increasing your damage done by {3}%, granting you {4}% leech, and reflecting {5} Nature damage back at your attackers.
Your Frenzied Regeneration also generates {1} Rage over {2} sec.
Finishing moves extend the duration of Tiger's Fury by {1} sec per combo point spent.
Ferocious Bite hits all nearby enemies affected by your Rip for {1}% of the damage dealt. Damage reduced beyond {2} targets.
Regrowth's healing over time is increased by {1}%, and it also applies to the target of your Lifebloom.
Starsurge and Starfall reduce the cost of Starsurge and Starfall by {1}% and increase their damage by {2}% for {3} sec, stacking up to {4} times.
Strike with the might of Ursoc, dealing {1} Physical damage to all enemies in front of you. Deals reduced damage beyond {2} targets.

Casting Rejuvenation grants the target {1} charges of Reactive Resin.

Reactive Resin will heal the target for {2} after taking a melee critical strike, and increase the duration of Rejuvenation by {3} sec.
Returns the spirit to the body, restoring a dead target to life with {1}% health and at least {2}% mana. Castable in combat.
Every {1} casts of Swiftmend grants you Incarnation: Tree of Life for {2} sec.
